radiographic_examinations.findings: Gallbladder is distended and contains sludge with a shadowing stone seen at the gallbladder neck. There is mild gallbladder wall edema along the perihepatic portion of the gallbladder and trace pericholecystic fluid in this region. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. CBD measures 4 mm. Limited views of the hepatic parenchyma are unremarkable with no focal liver lesions seen.
